data.actual_result: Invites appear after a second of no invite message that flashes when you click on instant invites.
data.expected_result: You should see instant invites that are present there
data.short_description: No new invite message flashes for a second when there are invites in a server.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a few instant invites in your server so that it appears in instant invites option on server settings - Go to server settings>instant invites
